title: What is thyroid? Can thyroid be cured by home remedies?
description: Answer (1 of 6): The thyroid is a butterfly-shaped gland located in the front of your neck, just below the Adam's apple. It is an essential part of the endocrine system, responsible for producing and releasing hormones that play a crucial role in various bodily functions. The two primary hormones...
